meanings.definition: A small shark of the family Squalidae.
meanings.sent1: The dogfishes swam gracefully in the ocean.
meanings.sent2: Fishermen caught many dogfishes during their trip.
meanings.sent3: The dogfishes had a meeting to discuss ocean matters.
meanings.sent4: The dogfishes in the sea seemed like silent guardians.
meanings.sent5: Children love to learn about dogfishes in school.

meanings.definition: A small, voracious marine fish of the family Squalidae.
meanings.sent1: The hungry dogfishes quickly devoured their prey.
meanings.sent2: The market sold fresh dogfishes for seafood lovers.
meanings.sent3: The dogfishes competed in an eating contest and won.
meanings.sent4: Her appetite was like that of the dogfishes in the sea.
meanings.sent5: The chef prepared a delicious dish using dogfishes.

meanings.definition: Any of various small sharks of the family Squalidae.
meanings.sent1: Scientists studied the different species of dogfishes.
meanings.sent2: The aquarium displayed a variety of dogfishes.
meanings.sent3: The dogfishes threw a party to celebrate their diversity.
meanings.sent4: In the vast ocean, the dogfishes roamed freely.
meanings.sent5: The documentary showcased the beauty of dogfishes.
